illya.kurochkin@gmail.com.title: Etherium
illya.kurochkin@gmail.com.decription: Ethereum is an open source, public, blockchain-based distributed computing platform and operating system featuring smart contract functionality. It supports a modified version of Nakamoto consensus via transaction-based state transitions.

illya.kurochkin@gmail.com.title: Bitcoin
illya.kurochkin@gmail.com.decription: Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency. It is a decentralized digital currency without a central bank or single administrator that can be sent from user to user on the peer-to-peer bitcoin network without the need for intermediaries.

illya.kurochkin@gmail.com.title: Litecoin
illya.kurochkin@gmail.com.decription: One of the first cryptocurrencies to use Scrypt as a hashing algorithm.

illya.kurochkin@gmail.com.title: Ripple
illya.kurochkin@gmail.com.decription: Designed for peer to peer debt transfer. Not based on bitcoin.
